message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. To kick things off, I'm offering it at $20,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $12,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $15,000?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget considerations.  While I can't go as low as $15,000, I could be persuaded to come down to $18,000.  This product truly offers exceptional value, and I'm confident you'll find it to be a worthwhile investment.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am still seeking to keep my investment within $12,000. Could we perhaps reach an agreement closer to that amount?
